Namespace kernel\cache

Class Summary
apcThis class implements CRUD operation for storing cache in APC storage engine
fileThis class implements CRUD operation for storing cache in file storage engine
memoryThis class implements CRUD operation for storing cache in memcache storage engine
xcacheThis class implements CRUD operation for storing cache in xcache storage engine
Interface Summary
cacheBase interface for all cache drivers
